channel.title: metaphor on Long Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in metaphor on Long Thoughts

item.title: Life: A Game of Games
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Living in a complex world, everyday we’re moving from friend groups, to work, to chores, to dreams, to drama. Each and every area of life has such depths, that it seems like a world in itself. What can be gained by looked at it through the metaphor of the game of games?

item.title: Movie Analysis: The Boy and the Heron
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Yesterday I’ve seen “The Boy and the Heron”, or with its original japanese title “How Do You Live?” (君たちはどう生きるか). A grandious movie full of symbols, with much room for interpretation.
